sentences.en: ...a church spire poking above the trees.
A black iron cock sits on the spire of the town church.
sentences.cn: 一只黑色的铁公鸡坐在村里教堂的塔尖上.

sentences.en: A small turret or spire on a roof or buttress.
sentences.cn: 有以百叶窗遮蔽的钟塔和尖顶的教堂;装了绿色百叶窗的小别墅.

sentences.en: Dwarves arrive at Blackrock Spire on Gryphons.
sentences.cn: 矮人乘坐狮鹫到达黑石塔.

sentences.en: Gaia : Hidden deep within the spire lie the Sisters.
sentences.cn: 盖亚: 在命运女神巢穴的隐秘深处.

sentences.en: Its spire is formed from the entwined tails of three dragons.
sentences.cn: 它的塔尖乃是三只互相缠绕的龙尾巴.

sentences.en: No one would dream of straightening out the knobbly spire at Empingham Church.
sentences.cn: 谁都无法将埃姆平汉教堂疙瘩嶙峋的尖顶弄直。

sentences.en: Ptolus lies between the Spire and the sea.
sentences.cn: 托勒斯坐落在海洋与“大尖顶”之间.

sentences.en: Spire: Steeply pointed termination to a tower or roof.
sentences.cn: 塔尖顶: 塔或屋顶上尖锐陡峭的顶部.

sentences.en: The church spire ~ ed above the houses.
sentences.cn: 高耸于房屋之上的教堂尖顶.

sentences.en: The church spire is reckoned remarkably handsome.
sentences.cn: 人们都说教堂的那个尖顶很漂亮.

sentences.en: The church spire was struck by lightning.
sentences.cn: 教堂的尖顶遭到了雷击.

sentences.en: The spire of the tower dominates the foreground.
sentences.cn: 塔尖在前景中占了主要地位.

sentences.en: We could see the spire of the church in the distance.
sentences.cn: 我们可以看到远处教堂的尖塔.

sentences.en: We looked at the tower the spire of which was golden.
sentences.cn: 我们望着塔尖是金黄色的那座塔.

sentences.en: When they came to build the southern spire the foundations began to sink.
sentences.cn: 他们建南边的塔尖时，地基就开始下沉了。

words.tran_cn: 盘旋；成螺旋形；螺旋形上升（过去式spiraled/spiralled，过去分词spiraled/spiralled，现在分词spiraling/spiralling，第三人称单数spirals，副词spirally）
使成螺旋形；使作螺旋形上升

trans.tran_cn: 螺旋，塔尖，尖塔，[动]螺旋部，（软体动物的）螺塔
trans.tran_en: a roof that rises steeply to a point on top of a tower, especially on a church
